data: Hudson | New York | Marvin Motors Company
lower Hudson | New York | mahogany flat-topped desk

In one of the stateliest mansions on the lower Hudson, near New York, old Stanford Marvin, president of the Marvin Motors Company, dozed over his papers, while Owen, his confidential secretary, eyed him across the mahogany flat-topped desk.
